## MapView.tileGeometryManager property

The \[\[TileGeometryManager\]\] manages geometry during loading and handles hiding geometry of specified \[\[GeometryKind\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get tileGeometryManager(): TileGeometryManager | undefined;
```
